item.title: Inaugural Post and ... Re-posting an Old Post (1 of 4) from an Older WordPress site
item.description: Okay, so here goes for an inaugural post—hoping to essentially combine my graduate work (in Continental Philosophy and Derridean deconstruction—where the X without X [updated 12.24.2021: the old website this initial post came from was at xwithoutxdrs.wordpress.com] locution is so at home in the work of Blanchot, Derrida, et. al.)—with all of the new toys I am learning to play with from the Digital Humanities. So after a week-long research institute put together by some fantastic people at the College of St.
